channel.title: Can't find any of the files I need
channel.description:
I'm trying to edit the welcome screen of a 508.
I've read several tutorials and help topics and they all tell me to check in files like texthandler.java. But I can't find it anywhere, I've looked several times.... I've searched the word "Welcome" in almost every java file and cfg file, all I want to do is change the Welcome to (name)scape to my name

item.title: Can't find any of the files I need
item.dc:creator: @free_wayne free wayne
item.description:
@free_wayne wrote:

That must be why, but I still don’t know how to edit this :S

Thanks for your help though.

Read full topic
item.source: Can't find any of the files I need
